title: HELP?!?
body:
so i stupidly bought kha'zix about three days ago and after playing some games ive realised id like to refund him until i can find a better suited champion for me. ive read online that you cant refund the champion without refunding any skins for the champ first. i recieved a blossom skin from the loot reward chests and i cant refund the skin either because it wasnt purchased i got it from the chests. 

how can i do this? i want my rp back and am happy to use 2 of my tokens to do so. but i need to be able to get rid of this skin first. both of these items say "non-refundable" next to them. PLEASE HELP

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like you'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for this case, we here on the boards cannot assist with account specific inquiries.
